parameters.query: ={{ "SELECT id FROM exercices_comptables WHERE tenant_id = '" + $json.tenantId + "' AND date_debut <= '" + $json.dateEcriture + "' AND date_fin >= '" + $json.dateEcriture + "' AND cloture = false LIMIT 1;" }}

={{ "SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_piece FROM 'EC-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM ecritures_comptables WHERE tenant_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.tenantId + "' AND numero_piece LIKE 'EC-' || TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY') || '-%';" }}

={{ "INSERT INTO ecritures_comptables (tenant_id, exercice_id, journal_code, numero_piece, date_ecriture, date_echeance, libelle, reference, type_piece, entite_type, entite_id, montant_total, source) VALUES ('" + $json.tenantId + "', '" + $json.exerciceId + "', '" + $json.journalCode + "', '" + $json.numeroPiece + "', '" + $json.dateEcriture + "', '" + $json.dateEcheance + "', '" + $json.libelle + "', '" + $json.reference + "', '" + $json.typePiece + "', '" + $json.tenantId + "'0, '" + $json.tenantId + "'1, '" + $json.tenantId + "'2, '" + $json.tenantId + "'3) RETURNING id, numero_piece, date_ecriture, libelle, montant_total, statut;" }}
